questions.question_text: Select the allowed visualization type for Text Analytics Widgets.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
To help analysts visualize any patterns in user-entered text in an indicator, create a word cloud visualization in a text widget.

questions.question_text:
An Active Collection Job is configured as follows:
• Relative start: 0 days ago
• Relative end: 0 days ago
• Run: Daily

Which scores will be collected for a Daily Indicator included in this job?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B; scores for today

For an Active Collection Job configured with a relative start and end of "0 days ago" and set to run daily, the scores that will be collected for a Daily Indicator included in this job are:

B. Scores for Today

The configuration indicates that the collection job will capture the scores from the current day, each day it runs. "0 days ago" refers to today's date relative to the time the job is executed.

choices.C: The job fails and no scores are collected

questions.question_text: Which Breakdown Source attribute becomes visible and disabled when the number of Breakdown elements exceeds the maximum allowed as defined in the System Properties?

discussion.content:
When the number of Breakdown elements exceeds the maximum allowed as defined in the System Properties, the attribute that becomes visible and disabled is:

C. DC active

This attribute relates to the data collection process. When too many elements are present, surpassing the system-defined limit, it could impact the performance and functionality of data collection jobs, thus the "DC active" attribute would reflect this state, indicating issues with active data collection configurations.

questions.question_text: Which of the following visualisation types allow you to add multiple data sources of the same type in the UI Builder? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
Only time series and bars from the available options let you select multiple data sources. The scores and pie/donut do not let you select multiple

Selected Answer: BD
Time series and bars

Selected Answer: BD
only time-series and bars can have multiple data sources

The visualization types that allow you to add multiple data sources of the same type in the UI Builder are Time Series and Bar visualizations. Therefore, the correct answers are:

B. Time Series
D. Bars

These options enable the comparison of scores or trends between different data sources, making them suitable for visualizing changes over time or across different dimensions .
You can add multiple data sources of the same type for time series (including Area, Column, Line, Stepline, and Spline) and bar (including Horizontal bar and Vertical bar) visualisations.

Selected Answer: BD
Pies can only have one data source on the same time

To configure a Daily Collection job to collect scores for yesterday, you should set:

D. 1 days ago to 1 days ago

This configuration means the collection job will look back 1 day from the current date for both the start and the end of the collection period, effectively collecting data for the entirety of the previous day, which is "yesterday."

questions.question_text: You have a Daily Collection job. How should you configure Relative start and Relative end to be able to collect scores for yesterday?
